ale.greeting: Hey there! I'm Al√™, your virtual assistant.
ale.welcome: Hi! üòä Want to learn how to keep your software legal and work worry-free? I'm here to help! First, what's your name?
ale.askCompliance: Have you heard about software compliance?
ale.noComplianceExplanation: No worries! Compliance basically means using legal and licensed software. It's super important to protect your company! üí°
ale.yesComplianceResponse: Great! So you already know how important it is to keep everything in order. üëç
ale.askRole: What's your role in the company?
ale.askAlert: Have you received any alerts or emails about software usage?
ale.alertYesResponse: I understand! It's super important to resolve this quickly. I'll help you! üöÄ
ale.alertNoResponse: That's great! Let's keep it that way, with everything in order. üòä
ale.askAuth: Great, {{name}}! To continue helping you and send you a personalized report, you can identify yourself here:
ale.authError: Oops! Something went wrong. Can you try again?
ale.askWhatsappMessage: Perfect, {{name}}! If you prefer, I can assist you directly on WhatsApp. It's faster and more convenient! üòâ
ale.whatsappPreferNumber: I prefer to provide my number
ale.whatsappAskNumber: If you have WhatsApp, I can ask our team to contact you directly. What's your number?
ale.whatsappRedirectMessage: I've redirected you to WhatsApp! Our team will contact you soon. üì±
ale.whatsappDefaultMessage: Hi, I'm {{name}} from {{company}}. I talked to Al√™ and want to know more about compliance.
ale.finalNoProblem: No problem! I can continue helping you right here.
ale.finalHereToHelp: If you have any questions, just ask me. I'm always online. üí°
ale.askWhatsapp: To have our team reach out and help you better, could you share your WhatsApp?
ale.askConsent: Before we continue, I need your permission to use your data only for guidance on original software, is that okay?
ale.consentText: Your data will only be used for software licensing guidance, according to our Privacy Policy.
ale.consentAccepted: I authorize the use of my data
ale.thankYouBusiness: Perfect! üéâ Our team is available now and will contact you shortly to help with regularization.
ale.thankYouAfterHours: Thanks! üåô I've received your information. Our team is out of office (9am-6pm), but we'll contact you as soon as possible!
ale.understandDecline: No problem! If you change your mind, I'll be here to help. You can explore our website to learn more about original software.
ale.errorSaving: Oops! I had a little problem saving your information. Can you try again?
ale.outOfHoursMessage: Thanks! Our team is currently offline. We'll contact you as soon as we're back.
ale.errorMessage: Oops! Something went wrong. Please try again.

riskAlert.title: Protect your business and your clients
riskAlert.description: Using licensed software shows professionalism and respect for intellectual property. Beyond avoiding legal risks, you ensure access to technical support, security updates, and build a solid market reputation.

compliance.title: What is Software Compliance?
compliance.description: Software Compliance means using programs according to their licenses, respecting copyrights and intellectual property. It's essential for businesses that value ethics, security, and sustainability.

legal.title: Legal Protection
legal.description: Avoid costly fines and lawsuits by keeping your licenses current and properly documented.

security.title: Enhanced Security
security.description: Licensed software receives regular security patches, protecting your valuable data and systems.

reputation.title: Professional Credibility
reputation.description: Show clients and partners you run an ethical business they can trust.

sketchup.title: SketchUp for Architecture Professionals
sketchup.subtitle: Work with peace of mind and legal security. Our specialized team helps you regularize your licenses in a simple and affordable way.

itca.title: üìã Regularization Program
itca.description: Trimble, SketchUp's developer, offers special regularization programs for professionals and companies. Our team is ready to guide you through this process, ensuring the best benefits and conditions.

financial.title: Smart Investment
financial.description: The cost of an original license is much lower than potential forced regularization costs. Plan ahead and protect your budget.

legal.title: Legal Security
legal.description: Work peacefully knowing you're compliant with intellectual property and copyright laws.

professional.title: Market Credibility
professional.description: Companies that respect software licenses demonstrate professionalism and earn client and partner trust.

cta.text: Our specialized team is ready to help you regularize your situation

complianceExtra.sectionDescription: From Frank Lloyd Wright's Prairie School to today's modern offices, American architecture has always stood out for creativity and innovation. To maintain this excellence, it's essential to work with licensed tools.

gallery.title: Inspiration from Modern American Architecture
gallery.description: Just like the great masters of American architecture revolutionized the world with their organic and innovative forms, we help you build a solid and legal foundation for your creative work.

cta.title: Work with Peace of Mind
cta.description: Architects and engineers using licensed software have access to exclusive resources, technical support, and constant updates that enhance their creativity.

brazilian.title: Inspiration from Modern American Architecture
brazilian.description: Just like American architecture revolutionized the world with its organic and innovative forms, we help you build a solid and legal foundation for your creative work.

professionals.title: Professionals Building the Future
professionals.description: American architects and engineers are among the most creative and innovative in the world. To maintain this excellence, it's essential to work with licensed tools that guarantee security, support, and constant updates.

buildGreat.title: Build Great Things
buildGreat.subtitle: with Confidence
buildGreat.description: From Frank Lloyd Wright's Fallingwater to today's most modern works, great American architects have always built with reliable and licensed tools. Be part of this tradition of excellence and innovation.

cta.title: Be Part of American Architecture History
cta.description: Great projects require reliable tools. Use licensed software and build the future of American architecture with legal security and complete technical support.

errors.title: Oops! Something went wrong
